elements.text: You have been in the same post for five years, and you are beginning to feel bored and unchallenged in your job. You would like to try for a new position, but you worry if you will be competitive on the job market. Thinking about your career trajectory, you believe your chances of finding a new job that you find fulfilling are...

elements.name: Changing Your Trajectory_Work/Career Development_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
